Paragraph: Copolymers P1-P4 were synthesized through Stille coupling reaction of the dibromide monomers 5a,b or 7a with benzodithiophene-2,6-ditin or 2,2 0 -bithiazole-5,5 0 -ditin , while P5 was synthesized through Suzuki coupling reaction of the dibromide monomer 5b with benzothiadiazole-4,7-diboronic ester.

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column "Material Name":

| dibromide monomers 5a,b |
| benzodithiophene-2,6-ditin |
| 2,2 0 -bithiazole-5,5 0 -ditin |
| dibromide monomer 5b |
| benzothiadiazole-4,7-diboronic ester |

Note that I have presented the entities exactly as they appear in the original paragraph, including any punctuation or capitalization.
